message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by its previous owners. Given its quality and uniqueness, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $100. Considering its exceptional features and benefits, I'm offering it to you for $120. This price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the opportunity to own a piece that has been meticulously crafted and appreciated by many. I trust this offer will be appealing to you, given its true worth. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product.
